name: Oversized
description:
This game is a submission to the GoGodotJam 2021.

Oversized is a bullet hell roguelike videogame, where every single time you kill an enemy you get bigger.

You don't know the reason why you are in this absurd place, however your only goal is to defeat the slimes king.

It's up to you. You can try to defeat him right away or you can choose to face him after becoming better prepared.

Credits:

  • A game by amdotblacksheep
  • Art by final boss blues, Kenney and amdotblacksheep
  • Music by N.91music
  • Sound effects by Shapeforms
  • Font by Poppy Works
  • Palette by AdamCYounis
